member.name: T:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.ColumnAttribute
member.summary: Csv Column Attribute to assign to POCO Properties.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.ColumnAttribute.Index
member.summary: Defines the index position within the CSV document. Numbers can be skipped for the reader to ignore certain columns, for the writer numbers can also be skipped which leads to empty columns.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.ColumnAttribute.Header
member.summary: Defines the header text, this property only applies to the CsvWriter, if not specified, the property name is used.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.ColumnAttribute.OutputFormat
member.summary: Apply a string format, depending on the Property type. This property is for CsvWriter only.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.ColumnAttribute.OutputNullValue
member.summary: Defines the value to write as a default for null, This property is for CsvWriter only.

member.name: T:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamReader
member.summary: Implements a System.IO.TextReader that reads characters from a byte stream in a particular encoding. Extended with ReadCsvLine to read a Csv Line conform RFC 4180.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamReader class for the specified file name.
member.param: The complete file path to be read.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamReader.#ctor(System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamReader class for the specified file name, with the specified character encoding, byte order mark detection option, and buffer size.
member.param: The complete file path to be read.
Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the file.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamReader class for the specified stream.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamReader class for the specified stream based on the specified character encoding, byte order mark detection option, and buffer size, and optionally leaves the stream open.
member.param: Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the file.
true to leave the stream open after the System.IO.StreamReader object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter
member.summary: Implements a System.IO.TextWriter for writing characters to a stream in a particular encoding. Extended with WriteCsvLine to write a Csv Line conform RFC 4180.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamWriter class for the specified file by using the default encoding and buffer size.
member.param: The complete file path to write to. path can be a file name.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamWriter class for the specified file on the specified path, using the specified encoding and buffer size. If the file exists, it can be either overwritten or appended to. If the file does not exist, this constructor creates a new file.
member.param: The complete file path to write to. path can be a file name.
true to append data to the file; false to overwrite the file. If the specified file does not exist, this parameter has no effect, and the constructor creates a new file.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamWriter class for the specified stream by using UTF-8 encoding and the default buffer size.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.IO.StreamWriter class for the specified file by using the default encoding and buffer size.
member.param: true to leave the stream open after the System.IO.StreamWriter object is disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.Separator
member.summary: Csv Seperator to use default ','

member.name: P:DevToys.PocoCsv.Core.CsvStreamWriter.CRLFMode
member.summary: \r\n = CR + LF → Used as a new line character in Windows. \r = CR(Carriage Return) → Used as a new line character in Mac OS before X. \n = LF(Line Feed) → Used as a new line character in Unix/Mac OS X
